result.reason: Feature request for proper SQL multiuser support — incremental saves instead of full overwrite on exit, plus live reload of other clients' changes
result.approach: Implement dirty-tracking on ConnectionInfo so only modified connections are written to SQL on save, and add a periodic poll (or SqlDependency) in SqlConnectionsLoader to detect and merge remote changes from other clients without full tree reload

attempts.raw_output:
This is a feature request for proper multi-user SQL support — incremental saves and live reload of changes from other clients. This is a significant architectural enhancement, not a simple bug fix.
